Package simple.gui.container

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonGrid
    A simple panel for laying out buttons in a row or column.
    ButtonPanel
    JPanel wrapper for buttons.
    ConfigLayoutPane
    A JPanel that more easily allows for labels one side and fields on the other.
    ConfigPage
    This abstract class gives general implementation to create "plug-in" configuration panels.
    ImagePanel  
    RadioButtonGroup
    Simple spinoff of ButtonGroup.
    Manages JRadioButtons allowing only one to be selected at a time.
    ScrollableJPanel
    Allows a JPanel to be added to a JScrollPane.
    Found out soon after making this class that I had goofed in my layout.
    SimpleBorderLayoutPane
    A more natural border layout.
    The top and bottom lays out components left to right.
    The right, left and center lays out components top to bottom.
    WizardFrame
    This is a JDialog frame that is used in combination with WizardPanel to create a step-by-step wizard.
    What the frame looks like:
    WizardPanel
    Panels to be used in conjunction with a WizardFrame.
